item.title: Copy from / to / between aws
item.description: Copying directory to s3 with structure intact aws s3 sync myDir s3://mybucket --profile dev Recursively copying S3 objects to a local directory aws s3 cp s3://mybucket . --recursive --profile prototype Recursively copying local files to S3 aws s3 cp myDir s3://mybucket/ --recursive --exclude "*.jpg" --profile prototype Recursively copying S3 objects to another bucket aws s3 cp s3://mybucket/ s3://mybucket2/ --recursive --exclude "another/*" --profile prototype Copying an S3 object to a local file aws s3 cp s3://mybucket/test.
